Oh, blessings, blessings!
I'm a bit embarrassed to say this, but I'm not sure if we can meet up alone right now.

Quietly leaving

When others got married, they did it quietly without us knowing, or I quietly knew about it. Now, the person who quietly knew about my separation from them has also quietly found out, and I heard about it from others.

Oh, I had no idea. Maybe KT thought the price adjustment was a good idea at the time, but after half a day, we realized that we might not be compatible with each other, and our personalities didn't match.
I don't know either.

It wasn't mainly about how they were at that time, right? Didn't you think they were an unsuitable match? I thought they were quite suitable for each other. Now it seems you were right to say they were an unsuitable match.
I thought you were the one who set that up.
I thought that the match you set up was not really you. I thought they knew each other and were together at the time.
Well, never mind. Let's not eat with them anymore. Let's make a separate appointment. Let's see and ask what's going on.
Oh, let's talk about it again and again.
Hey, look, why don't we set up a meeting with KD and his wife in the next couple of days and have dinner together?

What's wrong?
What's going on?
It's not like they've only been married for that long.
Why is it that your marriage doesn't last long?
That doesn't make sense. What kind of marriage would that be at that time?
There must be a reason for this.
You see, at that time, I thought that because of the age difference between them, they would never end up together. But I never expected that he would get married just over a month later.
I said, "What's the point of marrying someone who's not age-appropriate? They're over a decade apart in age, and they got divorced after just over a month."
Who knows? You and he have a good relationship, so I'm asking you about everything.
It's not easy to go on a date alone.
Xiao Hong, I told you it's closer to the subway here, but it's three kilometers to your place. It's inconvenient for me to commute from there.
It's not that you are the rising sun, but look at how much bigger other people's windows are. Look at this window, it's so small. I'll just open my eyes to see the rising sun.
Isn't that a hard requirement? I want to live in a better place. Look at this wall, the conversation is all messed up. With five flavors, can't you find me another house?
You see, you're not speaking correctly. I see that you're paying me to help you, so don't look for a car elsewhere.

I'm sure with this amount of money, I can find a better place to stay. You just look around for me. There are so many options nearby. Why do you insist on this particular neighborhood? Is this all the capability you have? Just find me a house.

Alright, alright. I can see that your abilities are only this much. Let's just forget it. Really.

I told you it's not me, I'd be annoyed if I had to introduce these clients to you every month, you know that.

But you see, I found you a place close to the subway. You said the rent was too high and it wasn't suitable for you, so I found you something a bit further away. Then you complained about the newly painted walls. How about a motorhome? It's spacious and comfortable.

Don't take this from me, I'm telling you. This is because when it was scraped by Da Bai, it lost its flavor. You're really too demanding, you know. I can't do that for a month. No way, I won't rent it out.
